data.description: Single-mode diode lasers and amplifiers and their applications; an in-depth treatment of the four basic types of high-power coherent diodes: phase-locked arrays, master-oscillator power amplifiers, unstable resonators, and external-cavity-controlled resonators. Knowledge of electromagnetics [such asE C E 320] and solid-state electronics [such asE C E 335] strongly encouraged.
data.title: HIGH-POWER DIODE LASERS AND AMPLIFIERS
